mapper.update: UPDATE BASKET SET P_CNT=#{pCnt} WHERE P_NUM=#{pNum} and ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT P_NUM, P.THUMNAIL_IMG, P.P_NAME, P.PRICE,P.SALEPRICE, P.STOCK, P.DISCOUNTRATE, B.P_CNT, U.ID FROM PRODUCT P JOIN BASKET B USING(P_NUM) JOIN USERS U ON U.ID = B.ID WHERE B.ID = #{id} AND P_NUM= #{pNum}
